SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Storefront Experience: Learn and Customize B2B Commerce for Visualforce Faster

Learn B2B Commerce for Visualforce more quickly and completely, and start customizing your storefront experience in fewer steps. With a new demo storefront, new data sets, and new themes, it’s easier than ever to bring your storefront online.

Explore All the Features of B2B Commerce for Visualforce in a New Demo Storefront
B2B Commerce for Visualforce now provides a new demo storefront for a business called Capricorn Coffee. The demo storefront includes more examples of complex products and pricing scenarios. See more use cases of B2B Commerce for Visualforce features in action before you implement them. Download the Capricorn Coffee theme and data set as a reference for your own.
Create a Custom Theme or Data Set from a Minimum Static Resource
To help you easily create your own storefront data or theme, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now provides static resources that you can use as starting points. These static resources differ from the Capricorn Coffee demo data set and theme in that they contain only the folders and files necessary to get started.
